00061 class NTBP_multi_current_o : public NTBP_membrane_current_o {
00062 public:
00063 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/
00064 NTBP_multi_current_o(
00065     NTreal reversalPotential, // in mV
00066     NTreal density, // channels per mumeter^2
00067     NTreal area, // in mumeter^2
00068     NTreal conductivity, // in mSiemens per channel
00069     NTreal vBase = 0 // mV
00070     );
00071 NTBP_multi_current_o(const NTBP_multi_current_o & original);
00072 const NTBP_multi_current_o & operator= (const NTBP_multi_current_o & right);
00073 virtual ~NTBP_multi_current_o();
00074 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00075 //virtual NTreal ComputeConductance() = 0;
00076 //virtual NTreturn StepCurrent() = 0;
00077 /* mementary total conductance */
00078 NTreal _density() const { return density;}
00079 NTreal _area()  const { return area; }
00080 /* conductivity per channel in mSiemens */
00081 NTreal _conductivity() const { return conductivity; }
00082 /* conductivity if all channels open in mSiemens/cm^2, */
00083 NTreal _maxConductivity() const {return density /* num/muMeter^2 */ * conductivity /* mSiemens */* 1.0e8 /* muMeter^2/cm^2 */;}
00085 bool ComputeGillespieStep() {cerr <<"NTBP_multi_current_o::ComputeGillespieStep()" << endl; return channelsPtr->GillespieStep();}
00086 void UpdateNumChannels() { numChannels = (NTsize) ceil(density*area); }
00087 NTsize _numChannels() const { return numChannels; }
00089 NTreal NumChannels() const { return _numChannels(); }
00090 NTreal OpenChannelsRatio() const { return OpenChannels()/NumChannels(); }
00091 NTreal _vBase() const { return vBase;}
00092 // Dangerous: since cached values are not automatically recomputed in derived classes
00093 //void Set_vBase(NTreal newVBase /* mV */){ vBase = newVBase; }
00094 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00095 protected:
00096 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00097 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00098 static NT_uniform_rnd_dist_o uniformRnd;
00099 NTreal conductivity; // in mSiemens per channel
00100 NTreal density; // channels per muMeter^2
00101 NTBP_ion_channels_o * channelsPtr;
00102 private:
00103 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00104 /* ***  Data                 ***/

00107 NTreal vBase; // mV
